module.name: Ceres User Interface Library
module.description: The Ceres User Interface Library provides basic Java Swing user interface components supporting the Ceres Runtime Library, e.g. a module manager dialog and a configuration panel for connecting remote module repositories.
module.changelog:
Changes in 0.8
[CERES-32] ProgressMonitorSwingWorker can cause deadlock

[CERES-21] Version-controlled dependencies are not considered during update
